post:
Pretty much selling my OVH 2013 server,

http://www.ovh.com/us/dedicated-servers/range-2013/2013-SP-64.xml

>         Specs:
>         CPU:	Intel Xeon
>         E5-1620
>         4c/8t 3,6 GHz+/3,8 GHz+
>         RAM:	64 GB DDR3 ECC 1333MHz
>         Disks:	2x 2 TB SATA3
>         500mbps outbound
>         1gbps inbound.

It also comes with the anti ddos pro / custom arbor firewall rules.

It also comes with 16 ipv4's (cost $48 if you were to buy them directly ($3.00 each one time)

I can transfer it to your ca.ovh.com NIC.

Bill was just paid, so it's not due until 11/28

Looking to get at least $75 for this..

Renewing cost is $109/month
